title: Tender for the Supply of Intravenous Administration Sets, Sterile single use (7,500,000 sets) MSD/P/027/11 - DHS/(C)SU/713/11 SR NO. 042507
decision_details: - Cabinet approval was granted to award the above procurement to the lowest responsive bidder M/s Welfang Kawa Medical Product Co. Ltd., PR China at a total C&F price of US $671,250.00 (LKR 75,642,750.00).
